```{r,echo=F,warning=FALSE}
plotpath<-params$plotlink
#plotpath<-"D:/Dropbox/SheepWork/Collabs/ParturitionModel_Frances/LS/Plots/148770.png"
pp<-gsub(params$basepath,'',plotpath)
#pp<-"D:/Dropbox/SheepWork/Collabs/ParturitionModel_Frances/LS/Plots/"
#pp<-gsub(pp, " ", plotpath)

pp<-gsub('.png','',pp)
pp<-as.numeric(gsub('.','',as.character(as.numeric(paste0(substr(pp,1,3),'.',substr(pp,4,7)))),fixed=T))

a<-ll[which(as.numeric(ll$MatchFreq)==as.numeric(pp)),]
a<-a[order(a$tdate),]


#a<-a[,-nrow(a)]
a<-a[,-ncol(a)]

names(a)<-c('TagNumber', 'Frequency', 'SN', 'Spp', 'ID', 'AnimalID', 'Sex', 'X', 'Y', 'FixDate')



kable(a,format='markdown',row.names=F,align='c',digits=2,padding=0,caption='Recent Locations')
```
